questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Butterfly surrounded by leaves and flowers

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A family gathering

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) A building
B) A butterfly
C) A car
D) A person

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A butterfly
C) A statue
D) A pet

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) Green leaves and plants
C) Buildings
D) Water

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A road
B) Flowers and leaves
C) A bench
D) A fence

What color is the butterfly in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Red
C) Orange and brown
D) Black and white

What is the dominant color in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Yellow
D) Red

How many butterflies are visible in the photo?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What type of plant is the butterfly resting on?
A) Cactus
B) Tree
C) Flowering plant
D) Grass

A) Dry and brown
B) Fresh and green
C) Withered and yellow
D) Wet and shiny

A) Yes
B) No

A) Above the flowers

A) Yes
B) No

What is the main theme of the photo?
A) Urban life

D) Technological advancements

A) Upside down
B) Sideways
C) Upright
D) Diagonally

Is the butterfly the only living creature in the photo?
A) Yes
B) No

What part of the butterfly is most visible in the photo?
A) Wings

C) Legs
D) Body

A) Yes
B) No

How many flowers are immediately around the butterfly?
A) One

C) Three
D) Four

What is the butterfly primarily using to hold onto the flower?
A) Wings
B) Legs

D) Body

A) Yes
B) No

What is the state of the butterfly’s wings?

A) Yes
B) No

D) White

B) A medium portion
C) A small portion
D) Almost none

What is the focus of the photo?
A) The background
B) The foreground

D) The sky

A) Yes
B) No

What is the lighting like on the butterfly?
A) Direct sunlight

D) Artificial light

A) Yes

A) A bird
